extendedInfo.description: CAUTION!- This app is in experimental phase.- If you want stable version,  you should install 'Dropbox Connector'.-----Jota+ Dropbox Sync Connector is a plugin to connect Jota+ with Dropbox with Dropbox Sync API.Sync API is faster than classic API and has a retry mechanism.Limitation- You can access only in APP Folder. (/app/JotaPlus/)  Future version will support FULL ACCESS.- Sync Connector doesn't create backup file. (file~)  (Use revision management of Dropbox.)----------------------------Install this plugin then you can activate the connectivity to Dropbox of Jota+.This app only connect to Dropbox server.Jota+ Dropbox Sync Connector includes Dropbox Sync API.----------------------------This app needs Jota+ and Jota+âPRO-KEY.----------------------------How to use connector.- Touch 'Open' on the toolbar then file selector will open.- On top of the selector screen, there is "SD CARD" label.- Click it and select "Settings".- Select one which you want and install a connector.- Login to the connector.- Again on selector screen, touch "SD CARD".- Click the name of the connector.- Browse directory on the file system.- Open a file.Don't use explorer apps.
